title: Egg free, dairy free and nut free chocolate cake
ingredients: ['200g plain flour', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '200g caster sugar', '4 tablespoons unsweetened cocoa powder', '1 teaspoon bicarbonate of soda', '5 tablespoons vegetable oil', '1 tablespoon vinegar', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '225ml cold water', '85g plain chocolate chips']
